snippet: A group that includes former Dodgers owner Peter O’Malley and golfer Phil Mickelson agreed Monday to buy the San Diego Padres in a deal estimated to be around $800 million.
abstract: MLB Roundup; group that includes former Los Angeles Dodgers owner Peter O’Malley and golfer Phil Mickelson agrees to buy the San Diego Padres in a deal estimated to be around $800 million; baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: A group that includes former Dodgers owner Peter O’Malley and golfer Phil Mickelson agreed Monday to buy the San Diego Padres in a deal estimated to be around $800 million.

headline.seo: O’Malley and Mickelson Part of Group That Has Agreed to Buy Padres
headline.main: Padres to Be Sold to Group That Includes Phil Mickelson
headline.print_headline: O’Malley and Mickelson May Be in the Padres’ Future
